name: Billion Beat
description:
Billion Beat is a deep and challenging skill-based boxing action game.
  • Master a deep and nuanced combat engine that rewards skilled timing and careful attack selection.
  • Fight through a gauntlet of over a dozen meticulously crafted boss fights with multiple forms.
  • Utilize advanced Hyper techniques to humiliate your opponent and make the crowd go apeshit.
  • Upgrade your fists, seek advice from your Mascoach, or become a cyborg when fights get too tough and you need that extra edge.


  • Master an extensive moveset to fight your way to the top.
  • Execute techniques with perfect timing to unleash powered-up attacks.
  • Strategically build up and expend Energy to use Strong Punches and Rapid Flurries.
  • Enjoy a deeply satisfying combat engine with full damage modeling. Beat the enemy's glasses off, knock out their teeth, and give 'em a black eye.




  • Hype up the crowd by landing tricky-to-use attacks that demonstrate your skill.
  • Learn to use the Hyper version of each attack, which is less effective yet more rewarding.
  • Roll with the punches and beat dynamic missions.
  • Bet on your own skill. Ante up before each match and reap the rewards or suffer the consequences of defeat.


  • Gain experience, hit the Lawker Room, and level up each fist individually.
  • Customize your fighting style by filling out an unrestricted tech tree.
  • Buy, equip, and sip on Dranx to restore health in the middle of a match.
  • Undergo irreversible surgery and become a cyborg to unlock overpowered abilites.
